column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We had three tapas: garlic shrimp
column3: and a squid. The garlic shrimp and the squid were quite good
column4: and I will probably order them again next time. We also had two servings of paella (we really wanted to order one
column6: which was very good. The sangria was just mediocre
column7: not impressive at all. But I have to say
